title: Provided that when the development is composite where the plot is not handed over to MCGM in such cases entire area shall be deemed to be marked as existing amenity with the + sign indicating other uses on the said plot
clause_text: Provided that when the development is composite where the plot is not handed over to MCGM in such cases entire area shall be deemed to be marked as existing amenity with the + sign indicating other uses on the said plot.
